title: Spear-Phishing Attack Response
description: An analyst detects a targeted spear-phishing campaign against high-ranking officials.

tasks.description: Identify the characteristics of the phishing emails (sender, subject, attachment) from initial reports.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the indicators of compromise (IOCs).

tasks.description: Search email logs across the enterprise to find all users who received the phishing email.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst generates a complete list of affected users.

tasks.description: Remotely delete the malicious emails from all recipients' inboxes and block the sender's domain.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully contains the phishing campaign.
